maintenance.subtitle: Your website always running, worry-free
maintenance.description: Maintenance includes hosting, automatic backups, security updates, and technical support. You focus on selling, I take care of everything working.

q1.question: Do you charge in dollars?
q1.answer: Yes, all prices are in USD. We accept Zelle, PayPal, and international transfers.

q2.question: What if I don't have professional photos?
q2.answer: I'll guide you to take good photos with your phone. I can also use stock images if needed.

q3.question: Is maintenance mandatory?
q3.answer: It's not mandatory, but highly recommended. Without maintenance, you handle hosting and updates yourself.

q4.question: Can I add more products later?
q4.answer: Yes, monthly maintenance includes minor changes. For bulk uploads, it's quoted separately.

q5.question: Does it work with Mobile Payment?
q5.answer: Yes. The customer makes the payment, uploads the screenshot, and you verify manually before processing.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Over 48 completed projects with perfect rating on Workana. 9 clients have hired me again.

testimonial1.text: I had a critical problem with my WordPress portal and Christian solved it in record time, also proposing other actions to prevent this in the future. Totally recommended!

testimonial2.text: Excellent work with our Shopify store. Christian understood exactly what we needed and delivered ahead of schedule. Communication was impeccable throughout the project.

testimonial3.text: Top-level professional. He developed our e-commerce with all the features we asked for and also optimized the SEO. Sales increased 40% in the first month.

testimonial4.text: Christian configured product variants in our Shopify store flawlessly. A complex project he handled with total professionalism and speed.

testimonial5.text: We've worked with Christian on multiple projects. His technical knowledge and problem-solving ability are exceptional. He's always my first choice.

testimonial6.text: The automation Christian implemented saves us hours of manual work every week. He perfectly integrated all our tools with AI and automated workflows.
